title: LoL Bug URGENT
body:
I can't "Reconnect to Chat".
It says this: 
Unknown Error
An unknown error has occurred
Sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server. 
If you keep encountering this error you may want to check the support site or forum for more information.

What should i do?

replies.body: im stuck in an idntical situation and i want to play ranked with some friends

> [{quoted}](name=MaBxLuckwaz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OBtjONcb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-22T00:53:20.005+0000)
>
> im stuck in an idntical situation and i want to play ranked with some friends

This seems to be a common problem. My friend is having it too.
They even removed hextech cause it's this bad....
Nah, hextech is a completely different issue.
Oh so what's the reason behind the Brand ban in doombots?
it appears to be fixed, log out and back in to be sure
clubs as well as hextech crafting is messed up right now
Guys try to get into a lobby and then manually invite people via usernames. Works for people who have this problem as well. Only solution I have found atm.
Happening to me as well, even after i connected my ethernet.
Stuck in the same spot too. It'd be fine if I just couldn't use chat, but I can't even see my mate to send him an invite.
Having same issue, maybe it's just something wrong with chat service atm?

> [{quoted}](name=Benevolent Barto,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OBtjONcb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-22T00:51:39.787+0000)
>
> Having same issue, maybe it's just something wrong with chat service atm?

I don't know I'll see if my friends can log in.
